If you use Windows (as opposed to any other operating system) go to 
http:/=
/www.microsoft.com/, and do the 'windows update' thing ("Scan 
for updates"=
).  You need to download the 'Japanese language support', 
and if you downl=
oad the "Japanese IME", you will be able to input 
Japanese as well.  Then =
when you hit a webpage that is in Japanese, 
just right click on it, and ch=
oose 'encoding', then choose "Japanese 
Auto Select", and you'll be able to=
 see it.
